title: Fire Detection System
description: An IoT-based fire detection and alert system that uses sensors and machine learning to detect fires early and send instant alerts. Features real-time monitoring, SMS/email notifications, and a web dashboard for fire department coordination.

title: Jypsis
description: Jypsis is an innovative AI-powered learning companion that helps students understand complex topics through interactive explanations and personalized study plans. Features natural language processing, adaptive learning algorithms, and progress tracking.
